/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/simpletest_raspicam_cv.dir/simpletest_raspicam_cv.cpp.o  -o simpletest_raspicam_cv  -L/usr/local/lib -rdynamic /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal.so -lraspicam /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_videostab.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_ts.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_superres.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_stitching.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_ocl.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_gpu.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_contrib.so.2.4.9 -lraspicam_cv /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_photo.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_legacy.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_video.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_objdetect.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_ml.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_calib3d.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_features2d.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_flann.so.2.4.9 /usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libopencv_core.so.2.4.9 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/opt/vc/lib
